class.name: ocgd_ShapeAnalyzer
class.brief_description: Comprehensive analysis and measurement utility for OpenCASCADE shapes.
class.description:
Comprehensive analysis and measurement utility for OpenCASCADE shapes. This class provides methods to analyze geometric properties, validate shapes, compute measurements, and extract geometric information from CAD models. It supports both exact analytical calculations and approximation methods for performance-critical applications.
The analyzer provides capabilities including global properties (mass, volume, surface area, center of mass), geometric measurements (length, area, volume calculations), inertia properties (moments of inertia, principal axes, radius of gyration), bounding box and geometric bounds analysis, shape validation and quality checks, distance and proximity measurements, and geometric feature detection and classification.
The analyzer supports different computation methods: exact analytical calculations using geometry, triangulation-based approximations for performance, and adaptive precision based on shape complexity.

method.name: analyze_complexity
method.description: Analyze shape complexity. Returns Dictionary with complexity metrics.

method.name: analyze_curvature
method.description: Get curvature analysis for surfaces. Returns Dictionary with curvature statistics.

method.name: analyze_multiple_shapes
method.description: Analyze multiple shapes and return summary statistics.

method.name: compare_shapes

method.name: compute_inertia_properties

method.name: compute_linear_properties
method.description: Compute linear properties (edge lengths). Returns Dictionary with: "length", "center_of_mass", "mass".

method.name: compute_surface_properties

method.name: compute_volume_properties

method.name: detect_features

method.name: export_analysis_to_string
method.description: Export analysis results to formatted string.

method.name: find_shapes_by_properties
method.description: Find shapes within tolerance of target properties.

method.name: get_angular_deflection
method.description: Get angular deflection setting.

method.name: get_bounding_box

method.name: get_center_of_mass

method.name: get_closest_point_on_shape

method.name: get_dimensions

method.name: get_distance_between_shapes
method.description: Compute minimum distance between two shapes.

method.name: get_distance_point_to_shape
method.description: Get distance from point to shape.

method.name: get_full_analysis_report
method.description: Get comprehensive analysis report for a shape.

method.name: get_high_precision_mode
method.description: Get high precision mode setting.

method.name: get_linear_deflection

method.name: get_max_dimension

method.name: get_min_dimension
method.description: Get minimum dimension of the shape.

method.name: get_oriented_bounding_box

method.description: Get shape quality metrics. Returns Dictionary with various quality indicators.

method.name: get_radius_of_gyration

method.name: get_recommended_mesh_parameters

method.name: get_shape_signature

method.name: get_surface_area

method.name: get_use_triangulation

method.description: Check if shape forms a closed shell.
